title: Courting Love
description: From the first day Courtney walked into Matthew's office as a new court reporter, the two became best friends. Matthew's law practice helps companies fight injury claims filed by employees. After eight years of friendship, one moment in time changed everything. Just as the couple began to explore their feelings, the unthinkable happens. A former employee of one of Matthew's client takes revenge on Matthew and Courtney that derails their budding romance. The resulting accident brings to light a rare lung disease that throws another road block in their path. With the help of their best friends, Jeremy and Jeannine, they realize that forever love is their destiny.Pulmonary Sarcoidosis is a rare lung disease that, in most cases, is not life threatening. It is a inflammatory disease that is more common in African American women between the ages of 20 and 40. Many times, the symptoms reside on their own with close medical supervision. Proceeds from this book will benefit research into this medical condition.
author: Lisa Jeannine
